QuestData.Title: Horn of the Traitor
QuestData.Description: Here lies the broken body of the Freewind Post lorekeeper, Montarr. The aged tauren's body is broken, lying in a pool of his own blood.$B$BA trail of droplets leads back to the inn....
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The Traitor. Get his remaining horn!
QuestData.RewardText: A traitor amongst the tauren?$B$BI've never heard of such a thing. Clan rivalries and warfare are one thing, but killing your own in cold blood.$B$B<Quentin shakes his head in disbelief.>
